website_summaries.verdict: An excellent tool that measures the necessary components for brewing.
pros: Comes with carrying bag, cleaning cloth, and brush
cons: A significant amount of test liquid is needed to determine ABV

website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive test kit for measuring alcohol content in your homemade wine.
pros: Plastic collection tube won't break like glass
cons: While this product is a good test kit, it does not include everything you need for home wine making

customer_reviews.title: Does not include the test cylinder
customer_reviews.text: I should have know better for the price offered, but I was a little disappointed that the kit did not include a test cylinder. I thought it did so I went back to review the description and photos. What I had mistaken for a cylinder in the photos is actually the hard storage case for the hydrometer. It will still work well, I just thought it included everything.
customer_reviews.author: Bearlover

customer_reviews.title: Fun kitchen / brewing tool
customer_reviews.text: The purchase and delivery of this product were exactly as I expected. The company sent me an additional email with some e-books to help me with using my hydrometer. I have never used anything like this and I still had to look up how to use it properly. I am using it to test sugar and alcohol content of my kombucha. I have taken initial readings for my current brew and look forward to using it at the end of fermentation to get my numbers. Comes in a beautiful storage bag and was easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Peters

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, great price, but requires ALOT of test beer to gauge content
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, great price, but requires ALOT of test beer to gauge content, i saw this on several reviews and decided to take a chance given this unit was so cheap and knowing something might not be perfect, but at least usable. If you sanitize the container first you may just dump it back in and no worries about how much it takes.
customer_reviews.author: Mike and Karie

customer_reviews.title: This has been so helpful in my water kefir and ...
customer_reviews.text: This has been so helpful in my water kefir and kombucha making. I strive for a very low sugar diet and this hydrometer make ensuring that my home brews are as low sugar as I can get them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: purchased this for my husband! He broke the old one he had and was excited to recieve this one. I was impressed with receiving an email on tips and an ebook in the mail after ordering. This company is very customer oriented and go above and beyond to make sure you are satisfied. I would recommend this product to every home brewer!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Great Service
customer_reviews.text: Making my own kombucha. Kit was just as it was described. Received an email from the seller with two downloads on home brewing and useful tips. An unexpected service. Will use them again!
customer_reviews.author: lesley pratt

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Using this for mead making. It comes with everything. A bag to hold it, a good carrying case for the hydrometer itself, a flash, a cleaning brush, and instructions. My only complaint is that the flask is kinda big. When making any sort of alcohol, you need to measure gravity. For small batches, taking 250ml can mean you're not going to get enough headspace if you don't return it. If you DO return it, you introduce the possibility of contamination or aeration. The hydrometer has PLENTY of room in the flask. I think having a more narrow flask would be a good improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Ghawblin

customer_reviews.title: Good Hydrometer.
customer_reviews.text: The hydrometer works well and is easy to read. The plastic graduated cylinder, not so much. The one I received was cracked at the top, but still usable. It is, however, very difficult to read through. I'm planning on replacing it with a glass one, so no bother.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to interpret
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and read. It comes with easy to understand instructions, in case you need your memory jogged. Unfortunately, within 15 minutes of owning it, I put it in a jar of sanitizing liquid and it bobbed and tapped the glass bottom harder than I’d expected and shattered :( however, I’m gonna chalk that up to my carelessness. My 15 minutes with the hydrometer were awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Ame

customer_reviews.title: Bought for kombucha, works great!
customer_reviews.text: I was totally confused and overwhelmed, until I downloaded their booklet available FREE which answered all my questions. Now that I know what I am doing, this is great! Thanks for the helpful links and even the photos here on Amazon, as even with my readers I couldn't quite make out the small print, but thanks to blowing up the pic here, I now know what I am looking at! Not the fault of the meter; you can only print so big on this kind of tool!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Panzica

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun with the right tools!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much for the tips of brewing after my purchase, I am very pleased with the equipment I bought from you. My wine is fermenting now and hopefully it will taste great. Thanks again
customer_reviews.author: Perry Biccum

customer_reviews.title: we both think this is an Awesome tool. She has used it to measure the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my friend, we both think this is an Awesome tool. She has used it to measure the alcohol content of our first Kombucha brew! It worked flawlessly! Item is well packaged to prevent damage. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Janie

customer_reviews.title: Hard to read
customer_reviews.text: I love this kit. The test jar is glass is very nice but the color coded blocks and the very small print on the hydrometer make it very difficult to read. However it is accurate, but might want to buy a magnifying glass to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Quincy

customer_reviews.title: Good hyrdometer, translucent flask hard to read through.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hydrometer to help me get specific gravity readings of my brew as I begin my journey with homebrewing. This hydrometer works really well, and contains all the useful information. The only thing I would say is that the reading cylinder is a big too larger at 250ml. That's about a glass of wine of solution to pull just to measure SG. I ended up ordering a transparent 100ml one that works without me having to pull so much liquid out of the fermenter. Other than that, no issues or problems.
customer_reviews.author: M. Pompey

customer_reviews.title: Works fine but difficult to read
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t give this five stars because the writing on the hydrometer is difficult to see with the color schemes they chose
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Blodgett

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need in a hydrometer kit!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice kit! I particularly liked that it came with a cleaning brush. The hydrometer is easier to read than most due to the color coding on it. Also, the plastic collection tube is nice. I broke my last hydrometer tube which was glass. The only thing I would change would be to make the collection tube a little narrower so that it doesn't require you to fill it with as much wine must you are testing.
customer_reviews.author: RowdyRon

customer_reviews.title: Great Hydrometer
customer_reviews.text: After making several batches of beer, I figured it was time to step up my beer making game and purchase a hydrometer. I really like this hydrometer because its easy to read and use. The only thing that I don't like about it is that it does take a lot of liquid in order to get a proper reading and since I'm not using this hydrometer commercially, I just put the sample back into my carboy and continue to let the beer ferment until it is ready for bottling.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Great back up hydrometer!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a replacement for one I dropped and broke, I have since gotten a Tilt wireless hydrometer. I used both on a few batches just to check to ensure the Tilt was accurate and it was now I just use this as a back up in case the batteries die on the Tilt and I don't have another. I do like that it came with a nice bag to store it in as well as a brush to clean it with unlike some others.
customer_reviews.author: JessieTop Contributor: Brewing

customer_reviews.title: A Must(excuse the pun) for Wine Making
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to measure the sugar content in my wine musts. It is really nice that it has a storage case and that it has a testing tube for when you want to use it. My only complaint which is small is that the writing on it is hard to read for someone with poor eyesight. I have to use a magnifying glass to read it when it is in the tube, otherwise it has really helped me get the readings I need.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to Use
customer_reviews.text: This is not very easy to use. I’ve had one in the past that just told the proof level but this one is different. Much more difficult to use. The quality feel of the product is good and comes packaged well but for my purposes doesn’t easily do what I need it to.
customer_reviews.author: C.T.

customer_reviews.title: accuracy
customer_reviews.text: The first delivery arrived broken - very thin glass - but thought I'd try a replacement. Tested the hydrometer with a prepared solution of 1.062 specific gravity. The Chefast read 1.052 while a refractometer read 1.062 and weighing calculated to 1.062. Errors that large make it worthless.
customer_reviews.author: picky Feet

customer_reviews.title: To fragile
customer_reviews.text: Worked alright but shattered when hit the side of test tube
customer_reviews.author: Chris Tasber

customer_reviews.title: Reading the meter
customer_reviews.text: I feel the beeker jar should be glass. I am having a difficult time reading the results through the plastic. It was my understanding that you held it at eye level. The only way I could read it was to look down in from the top. I need to read the training material again. I bought this to determine the amount of alcohol and sugar in my Kombucha. I can't rate the accuracy because I don't feel I'm reading it right.
customer_reviews.author: grammyal

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy to use, economically priced
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good value. The hydrometer is very nice, easy to read, and the kit is quick and easy to use. It includes a 250 ml graduated cylinder (would have been nicer if this was 100 ml), a cleaning brush, storage containers, a storage bag, and instructions. Overall very nice kit, and economically priced for everything you get.
customer_reviews.author: gsxr

customer_reviews.title: Is it accurate?
customer_reviews.text: I am not an experienced wine maker, but I'm not new either. Why haven't the last 3 batches of wine fermented properly, as I have been relying on this thermometer to tell me accurate gravity levels...
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: First Time User of an Hydrometerr
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a very well made kit. For me, the scale is not too easy to read, but a magnifying glass solved that for me. I am a first time user, but from what I can determine it is stable and accurate. I have to add that customer support via email is great. I had a minor issue, and it was corrected quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Buck

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't even come with a graduated cylinder
customer_reviews.text: You can't even use this to measure anything once you get it because you need something tall enough to pour your liquid into. I don't know about you, but I don't have any 10 inch glasses lying around--and even if I did, I wouldn't want to waste that much of my beer to test ABV. Can't even test it to see if it's accurate. The pictures made it seem like it came with a graduated cylinder, but that's just some crappy plastic case for the hydrometer.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Cappillo

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great essential kit for any brewer. Comes with everything you need to get started to measure your ABV of your home brew. The graduated cylinder, hydrometer, and kit are all packaged safely and securely, and come with a nice carry bag to keep everything together. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: AwesomeDadGear

customer_reviews.title: Friendly people with a great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: The hydrometer was delivered very fast and was more then adequately packaged, the product itself was clean and accurate and was not defective in any way. I enjoy the hydrometer a great deal and plan to use it for years to come. The folks at chefast are also friendly and helpful, right after my purchase they sent me an email asking if i had recieved it, offered me help if i needed it and sent me a free ebook that i could keep as a resource. Five stars and more if i could!!!
customer_reviews.author: kyle adkins

customer_reviews.title: Choose another kit
customer_reviews.text: It doensn't include test jar AND, the "plastic tube" it comes with, is not a test tube, despite what a Q&A said. I'm now on amazon shopping for a different hydrometer.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Shattered
customer_reviews.text: I give no stars to ; easy to read (glass items were shattered) accuracy (glass items were shattered) easy to use (glass items were shattered). This was supposed to be a gift. Now, o can't return it for a replaced like item because broken glass is not allowed to be shipped. So sad.
customer_reviews.author: dee727

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need - but came damaged
customer_reviews.text: Product is everything you need to determine a pretty good estimate of ABV. Product is plastic and arrived with the base cracked into two pieces, so it could not be used. I super glued the base pieces back together and it is usable. The package appeared to be adequately packed to ensure no damage - but it still remained damaged. It isn't an expensive product, so returning it was more hassle than gluing it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Special

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use for a novice
customer_reviews.text: I have never tried any homebrewing before, so I'm very new to all this. Google and Youtube have been my best resources so far. This being said, I had no problems using, reading, understanding this hydrometer. The hydrometer came in a very nice protective plastic sleeve and has an attractive storage bag. The company has been very helpful and delivery was faster than expected. I highly recommend this hydrometer and this company.
customer_reviews.author: A. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Can't Read the Calibration
customer_reviews.text: The tube is made from milky plastic. It is nearly impossible to read the calibration through the plastic tube, making this set utterly useless. What were they thinking? All hydrometers should come with a glass tube. I cannot recommend buying this product. This is another example how buying online is much more difficult than buying in person at a store, where you can physically see the product before purchase. Another example of how Amazon has undermined traditional methods of purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Kaufmann

customer_reviews.title: Buy a different brand
customer_reviews.text: Didn't include everything that it said it should include and isn't eligible for returns.
customer_reviews.author: IndieDev

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read
customer_reviews.text: As advertised product was well presented. Upon opening I was amazed on how easy is to read the measurements. I had bought this for my husband and he is beyond happy on how good and easy is to use. They had also send us a link with information on how to brew at home. Over all I’m happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Yesicag

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic kit, for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: So I managed to break my hydrometer by having my hands full and didn't notice I was holding the tube upside down and it popped right through the red top and hit the floor. I needed a replacement quick, so shopped here. I found this awesome kit, and the holder it comes in will not repeat my previous mishap. Great value for the money, and great follow up.
customer_reviews.author: D. Beaucher

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this particular product as of yet .Just got on Monday. The quality appears to be pretty good however the beaker or the jars it was called is not a jar. it's plastic. if it would have been glass it would have hit five stars for sure. I'm going to keep it but description should read high impact resin or plastic jar. Maybe I'm old school as I thought a jar was made of glass. I'll pick up a beeker when time permits.
customer_reviews.author: Guido

customer_reviews.title: GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR WITH THIS KIT
customer_reviews.text: This kit did not disappoint—very cheap. Minimal instruction leaflet, storage bag logo worn, box was unsealed. I could return it but I will just use it to learn hygrometer reading procedure with scale provided. DO NOT EXPECT ANYTHING MORE at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: This Is the REal Thing for Homemade Wines!
customer_reviews.text: The only fault I have with this is the lightness of the print on the flask. It's difficult to read in most lighting situations. That being said, it is by far, the most easily used and its calibrated, on the triple scale, making it the perfect choice for homemade wines. I have three, fermenting now, and I simply can't wait.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I don't think it works!!
customer_reviews.text: I watched a couple of videos on how to read this hydrometer and nothing seems to work. I am very disappointed with it and would not recommend nor buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Clarisse

customer_reviews.title: Does its job, but breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: This product does its job and measures specific gravity accurately; I verified its accuracy independently by measuring density to calculate specific gravity. However, the product is incredibly fragile. I accidentally tapped it on the side of the sink and it broke. I've worked with plenty of glassware from cookware to lab glassware and I have never used something that breaks as easily as this.
customer_reviews.author: Christian L

customer_reviews.title: but it would take pretty poor quality control to screw-up a hydrometer
customer_reviews.text: Arrived well packaged in a bubble wrap lined envelope. Appears to be reasonably well made, but it would take pretty poor quality control to screw-up a hydrometer... it's 18th century tech, at least. The only quibble has to do with the opaque plastic of the graduate which makes it impossible to read the hydrometer unless it is filled to within an inch or so of the top. A clear glass one would be a significant upgrade, even considering the fragility.
customer_reviews.author: James Whalley

customer_reviews.title: Hydrometer worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: The meter kit arrived in perfect condition, no damage at all and was carefully wrapped. Instructions were a little confusing for a first time user, but after watching a quick youtube video then rereading the instructions it made a lot more sense, so I really wouldn't say this was the manufacturers fault but maybe me just being a novice. Used this first on a store bought bourbon to practice and check accuracy and it read exactly as the bottle % claimed. I would definitely recommend this hydrometer based on ease of use, price and accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa S.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Kit Money Well Spent
customer_reviews.text: Let me just say that this is a really nice little kit for the price this is real glass tube it's got a nice brush the hydrometer itself is excellent accurate way more so than the one I'm replacing and it's got a nice little thing on the tube to make it easy to read all in all just a great purchase couldn't be happier with this
customer_reviews.author: king in the north

customer_reviews.title: If you have a choice pick glass!
customer_reviews.text: I had a plastic tube for my old hydrometer and I never really liked it. So when I decided to get a new set I swore to go with glass. This was a nice set for the price. I didn't really need a bag to put the glass tube in but still very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Essential for home brewing!
customer_reviews.text: Great little collection for measuring specific gravity! The plastic graduated cylinder is nice. The top of the hydrometer is extremely fragile though. I made the mistake of picking it up from the very top and it broke with the smallest amount of pressure. The glass at the top end was paper thin.
customer_reviews.author: Ajay Ryerson

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived broken.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived broken. Everything in the package was fine except the Hydrometer Floater its self (the only actually required part). It was shipped inside the measurement tube, so it should have been safe from shipping damage, but maybe the halves of the plastic protector case got pressed together too hard, because it was shattered inside. Returning, but the process seems to be going smoothly so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like that this hydrometer came with a separate case for it, and a bag to keep everything in. I used it the other night while making mead & it is easy to use & read. What else can I say about it? They delivered what I bought. It has no extra features other than what was advertised. It is not a Swiss army hydrometer nor does it connect to my wifi. I'm not going to ding it for that however. :)
customer_reviews.author: Cullen D Estes

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: please understand this is my first hydrometer ever. i was extremely impressed . everything looked beyond professional and came packaged very clean. everything i needed to use this as well as keep it clean came with it. i cant wait to use it with my mead.
customer_reviews.author: robert sledge

customer_reviews.title: It does what it is supposed to do!
customer_reviews.text: I'm satisfied with the purchase. Everything arrived intact and on time. The scales and numbers are easy to read on the hydrometer. The cloth satchel and the ABV & Brix conversion chart included in the kit were nice bonuses. No question that the hydrometer must be handled with care, but with proper care and handling there's no reason this kit won't outlast me. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The colors on the hydrometer are too dark = makes is really hard to read
customer_reviews.text: The colors on the hydrometer are too dark - makes is really hard to read. The print was so small and the coloring so dark that this was unusable for me. I had to get another one. I went to a local brew shop and picked one out that had light colors and easier to read.
customer_reviews.author: Bachmann

customer_reviews.title: Bad graduated cylinder, ok hydrometer, unnecessary carrying bag.
customer_reviews.text: Not very good for home brewing the plastic opaque graduated cylinder requires a lot of beer to use and is hard to read. Find one with more detail and that comes in a small cylinder. The carrying bag is unnecessary. The old one on the right with a leaky cylinder is more useful.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Being new at this my opinion as to accuracy is, I guess. The ease of use is okay however the beaker/tube could be clearer. Seems a bit cloudy so find it necessary to use a flashlight to accurately see the lines on the float.
customer_reviews.author: Bucmeister

customer_reviews.title: Great, but mine developed a crack without mishandling
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a few months...then started to develop cracks and fill with water. It has never been dropped or mishandled. My guess is there was a tiny imperfection from the factory and a crack developed slowly from there over time.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M.

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra couple of dollars--get this test kit.
customer_reviews.text: I'm taking a mead class, and when I saw this on Amazon, I had to get it. It's easy to use, easy to read and there's an instruction sheet with a conversion chart. I plan on making beer, too. I know this tool will help. I like the case with the padding in it, too. Definitely worth spending a bit more on a better kit.
customer_reviews.author: Lorrie A. Oyer

customer_reviews.title: Junk, junk, junk!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very thin glass. I got this thing a few days ago. Used to test my current wine batch. As I was washing after us I barely bumped in the sink and the end shattered. Piece of junk in my opinion. I ordered a different brand that is more expensive but has much better reviews and is American made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You need a hydrometer to monitor your mead.
customer_reviews.text: As a med tech for many years and being familiar with these instruments it was a little difficult to read and too many scales in a small area. It does the job very well, however. So I would recommend using it.
customer_reviews.author: Johanne-portrait artist

customer_reviews.title: Love the kit ... the beaker is a necessity
customer_reviews.text: This was my first hydrometer purchase, and I am so glad I bought the KIT with the bottle brush and beaker instead of the hydrometer by itself. Without the tall beaker that comes in this kit, I could not have tested any liquids because none of my containers were tall enough to keep the hydrometer from bottoming out. Fill the beaker to 250ml, and voila! no problems!
customer_reviews.author: Ward

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The markings are easy to read and the cylindrical body is easy to clean. The all-glass construction makes this an easily breakable item, so be careful when handling. When the product arrived it was broken right out of the box. At first I was dismayed that the listing showed no returns, but I figured I'd reach out to them and respectfully explain what happened. Twoish hours after my message to them I had a coupon code that was equal to the cost of the product. After normal shipping times I have a working hydrometer.
customer_reviews.author: Jason B

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic customer service from Chefast
customer_reviews.text: The hydrometer works great and is easy to use. I like that it comes in a bag to keep all the parts together, and you can slip the hydrometer easily into the test jar to keep it safe. I had a slight problem with my order, and I was super impressed by how quickly and competently Chefast corrected the situation when I contacted them. A++ for awesome customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Megan F

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: When ordering anything glass online you always worry about it but they took extra care when packaging. Everything looks just as described, great quality for that cheap price.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Western

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product
customer_reviews.text: The hydrometer kit from Chefast was delivered quickly and was as described. The kit was very well packaged. The kit included everything I needed to test my beer. The design of the product is very good. The instructions were simple, but complete. The hydrometer appears to be very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne I Mudge

customer_reviews.title: Clarity and volume is not ideal
customer_reviews.text: The test jar is very hard to read because it is an opaque plastic. The SOLIGT is much better because it has a glass test jar that is very clear and smaller in diameter which means less volume to use and less waist.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Rundell

customer_reviews.title: KNOW HOW TO USE BEFORE YOU BUY
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this product is packaged, it has a hard plastic case and will survive a trip to the moon! That’s about the best feature! There’s no instructions. The Graduated cylinder is opaque plastic and is almost impossible to read through when dealing with murky liquids (like wine and Kombucha), forcing you to read from up high which you’re not supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: stevesmeka

customer_reviews.title: Warning - Not for real Kombucha
customer_reviews.text: This does not really measure the actual alcohol content, it only measures the sugar content before and after the ferment. Kombucha is a different culture than yeast, so does not produce the same amount of alcohol. One star because description mentions kombucha. Wish I would have researched a little more...Will be returning immediately
customer_reviews.author: Keliyah

customer_reviews.title: Required tool
customer_reviews.text: This was a first for me. It took me a while to figure out how to read it with any accuracy. I use it routinely when making beer and would not like to be without it. It is a necessary tool for brewing.
customer_reviews.author: Lanny Boddy

customer_reviews.title: Hydrometer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son, a gift. He was pretty pumped about this. Very excited to get to use the product. He will also get plenty use with the hydometer. Makes his own kombucha.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice design
customer_reviews.text: Crystal clear glass graduated cylinder. Nice hydrometer with included cleaning brush and case. Great for home brewing of any sort. I make fruit wine with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin G. McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Good value, which is important because I have broken a few... comes in a reusable protective case, and a drawstring bag. It's all just exactly right. When this cider is finished, I'll have some idea of how strong it is... I don't care, but that's the first thing anyone ever asks. For the record, it should be around 5.5%...
customer_reviews.author: Scott Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Purposefully packaged already damaged
customer_reviews.text: Even though the hydrometer works properly, the product was obviously packaged up already broken. The glass base is considerably chipped, and the chipped off piece was nowhere in the package.
customer_reviews.author: superduck

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to do. The only complaint is that the plastic jar is not very transparent, so you need to make an extra effort to read the result.
customer_reviews.author: BinManea

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: I made some wine and yesterday I went to check the proof. It showed negative alcohol, so I tasted it and I could tell there was alcohol in it. I decided to drink a decent bit and ended up hammered drunk. I wouldn’t recommend this product to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Everything showed up well-packaged and works as advertised. I've only used it once thus far, so I can't say anything about its long-term durability. The specific gravity of my beer landed exactly where it should on brewing day. I'll be using it again in a week. If anything goes wrong, I'll edit this review. Otherwise, you can assume it still works for me.
customer_reviews.author: David Todd

customer_reviews.author: greg hunn

customer_reviews.title: Sold on this hydrometer / test jar after first use

I use a spigoted bucket, so took samples as water added until OG was at target. Also appreciated the helpful temperature adjustment cheat sheet. If I screw up and happen to break this well made set, I would buy it again! Only reason for a 4 on "Easy to read" is due to my eyesight, not the product itself as represented.
